oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Flatt and Scruggs Grand Ole Opry stars at Temple Hill
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Flatt, Lester; Scruggs, Earl; Martha White Foods; Grand Ole Opry (radio program)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Two color window card (red and blue on white) Hatch poster announcing Lester Flatt and Earl Scruggs with the Foggy Mountain Boys live from Nashville at the Temple Hill Consolidated School. Poster features metal photoplates of Earl Scruggs and Lester Flatt.
